::Najah::

Najah continued avoiding Prowl's, while he tried to find out a way to 
destroy that male.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Prowl flies up after Najah, spinning out of the way of several 
shots. 
> He stops firing missiles, and instead fires a barrauge of rapid 
laser 
> shots from each gun at the snake.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Najah::
> > 
> > Najah took the control again and his rockets started work rightly 
> > again. When the snake belives that all his troubles had ended he 
> saw 
> > the signature-seeking missiles.
> > 
> > "Not again!!!!!" thought the snake
> > 
> > Najah shot several times with his blaster (25) and destroy the 
> > signature-missiles, and using his rockets, he went up.
